tool_description: Validates alternative text length and provides recommendations for maintaining optimal brevity while preserving essential information.

alt_text.description: Alternative text to validate for length

content_priority.description: Content priority level: essential, important, supplementary

error_messages: Invalid alt text: Provide valid alternative text to validate.
Invalid max_characters: Value must be between 25 and 250.
Invalid content priority: Use one of [essential, important, supplementary].
Text too short: Alt text may be too brief to be meaningful.
usage: Provide alt_text and optionally max_characters and content_priority. The tool validates length compliance and provides brevity recommendations.

is_valid_length.description: Whether the alt text meets length requirements
